text:
LEWI S HILL
Duncans Mills, Calif,
December 4, 1954
Dear Mr. Holt:
I am enclosing my check for $5.00 to cover the
cost of a dubbing of the Stevens "New England Anthology"
tape.
Mr. Stevens and his publisher as well have already
given permission for use of any and all of the former's
poems and readings which may be found appropriate for
the Rockefeller project.
Since the Christmas mail rush is underway, I will
appreciate your mailing this tape by air at the earliest
opportunity. Many thanks for your cooperation.
Sincerely,
Mr. John R. Holt, Manager
N.A.E.B. Tape Network
119 Gregory Hall
University of Illinois ,
Urbana, Illinois
RECEIVED
naeb headquarters
DEC 7 1954
L
